Message:
I loathe rumors...
They’re void of responsibility.

It’s unthinkable that someone
would know anything about
a person they’ve never
spoken to.

Has everyone forgotten
something as simple as that?

The other day, I heard of a girl
who was rumored to be a witch.
Her mother protected her,

only to end up being
targeted next.

It’s said that there can be
no smoke without fire,

but this town had tiny sparks
scattered all throughout.

There didn’t need to be
any rhyme or reason.

If the town just had a trigger,
it would gladly let those sparks
burst into flames.

I refused to let this pass.
I am a home tutor, after all.

It’s an educator’s duty
to teach and guide.

So, as my students
were held at the mercy
of these rumors,
I gave them a lesson.

“Please bear this in mind
and never let it go.
